decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason:

The eaves of the proposed single storey rear extension would exceed 3 metres. This would be contrary to the requirements set out within Class A, A.1(i) of Schedule 2, Part 1 of the General Permitted Development Order (GPDO) 2015 (as amended).
Reason : 2 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: 

The proposal includes a 0.4m high raised platform, therefore the proposal would not accord with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A.1 (k) (i) of the Town and Country (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended).
Reason : 3 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason:

The developer has not provided the correct height of the eaves of the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse, as such the proposal does not accord with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A.4 (a) (iii) of the GPDO 2015 (As amended).
description: APPLICATION FOR PRIOR APPROVAL IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION WITH THE FOLLOWING DIMENSIONS: EXTENDS BEYOND THE REAR WALL OF THE ORIGINAL DWELLINGHOUSE BY 6 M. THE MAXIMUM HEIGHT OF THE ENLARGED PART OF THE DWELLINGHOUSE WILL BE 4 M. THE HEIGHT OF THE EAVES OF THE ENLARGED PART OF THE DWELLINGHOUSE WILL BE 3 M.
